title: Shoot Your Shot , Ask Yee and More
itunes:title: Shoot Your Shot , Ask Yee and More
description:
Wednesday 8/2 – Today on the show we switched it up and decided to do our segment “Shoot Your Shot” on hump day Wednesday, and speaking of switching up during the segment we had a caller definitely switch up the way she shot her shot. Moreover, Angela helped some listeners out during “Ask Yee” and Charlamagne gave “Donkey of the Day” to a South Carolina man who robbed a dollar store and leaves a trail of coins to hideout.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Wednesday 8/2 – Today on the show we switched it up and decided to do our segment “Shoot Your Shot” on hump day Wednesday, and speaking of switching up during the segment we had a caller definitely switch up the way she shot her shot. Moreover, Angela helped some listeners out during “Ask Yee” and Charlamagne gave “Donkey of the Day” to a South Carolina man who robbed a dollar store and leaves a trail of coins to hideout.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
